Description: In the past, ~30 point out of 100 points were not measured in most plots to save time but still sample all plots (most points not sampled was 37/100)
Points that hit something other than the soil, rock or a species (e.g. tags, sensors, etc)
Dead material that was no longer attached to the plants
Bare soil without moss or lichen on it
Points that hit rocks where a rock was defined as anything larger than 1cm diameter
All bryophytes were grouped together as no one knew them to species
All lichen were grouped together as no one knew them to species
Carex lenticularis var lipocarpa. This is the dominant carex species at the site
A sedge we could not ID to species
